name: 8-bit Tetris
description:
This game is not just a regular Tetris (kinda) that you can just find on the internet, this is unique (also kinda) and has all Tetris features that is only 200. And this game supports 2 players

This game does not work offline (except for the HTML version)

HOW TO PLAY

Player 1: (Left board)

  • "Space" bar to start the game
  • "A" and "D" to move the incoming brick
  • "W" to rotate the incoming brick
  • "S" to move down the incoming brick
  • LShift (Left "shift") to hold the incoming brick
  • "Space" bar to instantly drop the incoming brick

Player 2: (Right Board)

  • "Enter" to start the game
  • Left and right arrow keys to move the incoming brick
  • Up arrow key to rotate the incoming brick
  • Down arrow key to move down the incoming brick
  • RShift (Right "Shift") to hold the incoming brick
  • "Enter" to instantly drop the incoming brick

Both Players: (Additional controls)

  • "F11" to full screen (and exit full screen)
  • "P" to pause both players
  • "Ctrl" + "R" to refresh the app

PS: If both players died, then refresh the app

MAIN GOAL

You must survive the game for as long as you can and beat each others' high score. Outlast the other player

HOW I MADE THIS

This  game was first made on HTML, then processed through a lot of apps (including: Nativefier, Resource Hacker, and Enigma Virtual box) For the rest of steps on how I made this, download "Color Blast (source code).zip" and read "PLS READ MEEEEEE.txt"
